name: SmsAppUrl
description: Send the URL for your app via SMS from the web.

TWILIO_NUMBER.description: The number you bought on twilio to send SMS from. (+15671234567)

MESSAGE.description: The message to send your users. Limit 140 characters.

SUCCESS_URL.description: The url to redirect a user to after the submit the form.

FAIL_URL.description: The url to redirect if a problem occurs.
